00037 #ifndef PLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_
00038 #define PLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_
00039 
00040 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00041 
00042 #include "AbstractCardiacCellFactory.hpp"
00043 #include "LogFile.hpp"
00044 #include "SimpleStimulus.hpp"
00045 
00049 template<class CELL, unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM = ELEMENT_DIM>
00050 class PlaneStimulusCellFactory : public AbstractCardiacCellFactory<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>
00051 {
00052 protected:
00054     boost::shared_ptr<SimpleStimulus> mpStimulus;
00055 
00056 public:
00062     PlaneStimulusCellFactory(double stimulusMagnitude=-600, double stimulusDuration=0.5)
00063         : AbstractCardiacCellFactory<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>()
00064     {
00065         mpStimulus.reset(new SimpleStimulus(stimulusMagnitude, stimulusDuration));
00066         LOG(1, "Defined a PlaneStimulusCellFactory<"<<SPACE_DIM<<"> with SimpleStimulus("<<stimulusMagnitude<<","<< stimulusDuration<< ")\n");
00067     }
00068 
00073     AbstractCardiacCellInterface* CreateCardiacCellForTissueNode(Node<SPACE_DIM>* pNode)
00074     {
00075         double x = pNode->GetPoint()[0];
00076 
00078         if (x*x<=1e-10)
00079         {
00080             return new CELL(this->mpSolver, mpStimulus);
00081         }
00082         else
00083         {
00084             return new CELL(this->mpSolver, this->mpZeroStimulus);
00085         }
00086     }
00087 };
00088 
00089 
00090 #endif /*PLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_*/
